properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEM_INFO A ( MEM_NUM , MEM_NAME , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_BIRTHDATE , MEM_WITHDRAW_DATE , MEM_CLASS , MEM_BLOCK_DATE , MEM_ENROLL_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , NULL , '회원' , NULL , SYSDATE )
SELECT A.MEM_ID FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_ID = ?

SELECT A.MEM_NUM , A.MEM_NAME , A.MEM_ID , A.MEM_PWD , A.MEM_EMAIL , A.MEM_ADDRESS , A.MEM_BIRTHDATE , A.MEM_LOGIN_COUNT , A.MEM_COIN , A.MEM_CAN_VOTE_YN , A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN , A.MEM_WITHDRAW_DATE , A.MEM_CLASS , A.MEM_BLOCK_YN , A.MEM_BLOCK_DATE , A.MEM_ENROLL_DATE FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN = 'N' AND A.MEM_ID = ?
SELECT A.MEM_PWD FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN = 'N' AND A.MEM_ID = ?
